DOC.brief_summary: It estimate 30 million U.S. adult type 2 diabetes 2050 . Contributing national trend obesity epidemic . Three randomized trial demonstrate intensive behavioral intervention prevent delay onset diabetes . The purpose pilot study inform future randomize , control Phase III trial population-based , telephonic , exercise weight loss intervention translate finding Diabetes Prevention Program practice . The telephonic intervention compare usual care ( 30 participant group ) . The investigator deliver intervention 12 weekly , 20-minute call , four subsequent maintenance call , total 16 call 24 week . Study outcomes measure baseline 12 24 week . For plan grant investigator overall hypothesis . The investigator ' goal develop test whether possible exercise weight loss
